content.question: What is the marginal revenue product of the fourth worker?

topic.text: 5.3: Profit-Maximizing Behavior in Perfectly Competitive Factor Markets

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
